data.name: Xanthe for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Xanthe is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Florence, Italy, Xanthe has Italian and German heritage. Xanthe and her family moved to Milan, Italy, when she was 10 years old. Xanthe moved back to Florence as an adult prior to making her debut in porn industry. In her younger years Xanthe worked in a clothing store and as a waitress at a restaurant. Xanthe also took part in bikini competitions whilst she was still living in Milan.

Xanthe first started working in the adult entertainment industry as an exotic dancer. In fact, Xanthe performed in exclusive gentlemen’s clubs for 9 years before she made her debut as a prostitute. It was during this time that Xanthe started to socialize with industry professionals who helped her out when she decided to make her porn debut in 2007. Xanthe has always had a sexually curious nature.

Help Xanthe to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Xanthe is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
